rules_text:
Hexproof
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Always searching for answers, the shamans have delved into the minds of animals. One has chosen the stag, fabled to possess a magical aura.[/i]
